About Our Company

Premium® Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (Tinkune, Kathmandu) is specialized team for customized software development. With more than 8 years of experience in other well established companies of Nepal, our team shortly as “Premium Tech” was established with the primary mission to develop software for the institutions like Co-operative Societies, Microfinances, Small to medium sized businesses etc.

We are you!!!

About a decade experience of our team in financial software developing sector we have learnt that our customer’s feedbacks are our greatest assets which mean that because of our customer’s feedback and suggestion we have made so far and we know we will go further. Our product totally reflects you because we value your feedbacks and suggestion as our greatest assets and believe as lifeblood of our business.

“ Forget your competitors, satisfy your customer ”
